https://tmrev.io/movie/1035970-Ai Yori Aoshi: Enishi - Miyuki 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lOhOa34frC966QiaF8GfGCWZvis.jpg Long before the days of Ai Yori Aoshi when Kaoru is a new student in college, it's Christmas time and who should pay him a visit but Santa, looking very much like Aoi. They eat a Christmas meal, spend time at an amusement park, go skating and take a late night walk, occasionally crossing the path of other girls from the original series in humorous moments. Ai Yori Aoshi: Enishi - Miyuki
